name: 19c74826-1202-5769-8252-c48ecd2efba6
notes: MBT is a memory-based tagger-generator and tagger in one. The tagger-generator part can generate a sequence tagger on the basis of a training set of tagged sequences; the tagger part can tag new sequences. MBT can, for instance, be used to generate part-of-speech taggers or chunkers for natural language processing.
title: Memory-Based Tagger Generation and tagging
